name: Kitsune Vengeance
text: You cleverly hide your attacks within your devious antics.
prerequisites: Int 13; Combat Expertise; Improved Dirty Trick; Kitsune Style; Kitsune Tricks; base attack bonus +6 or monk level 6th.
benefit: While using the Kitsune Style feat, when a foe provokes an attack of opportunity from you, you can attempt to perform a dirty trick combat maneuver in place of making a melee attack.
text_zh: 看似优雅的姿态背后，你隐藏着险恶的后手。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通阴招APG，灵狐式，灵狐计，BAB+6或武僧等级6。
benefit_zh: 当处于灵狐流的架势时，如果你的对手引发了一次你的借机攻击，你可以选择对他进行一次阴招战技攻击以取代正常的攻击。
